com.agorapulse.micronaut.console

Interface ConsoleEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroovyConsoleEngine, JavaScriptingConsoleEngine

    public interface ConsoleEngine
    The engine which can execute the script. Different engines exist for the different languages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExecutionResult execute(String code, Map<String,Object> bindings)
      Executes the script.
      String getLanguage() 
      List<String> getSupportedMimeTypes() 

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        ExecutionResult execute(String code,
                        Map<String,Object> bindings)
                 throws Throwable
        Executes the script.
        Parameters:
        code - the body of the script
        bindings - the map of objects available for the script
        Returns:
        the execution result
        Throws:
        Throwable

      • getLanguage

        String getLanguage()
        Returns:
        the language supported by this engine

      • getSupportedMimeTypes

        List<String> getSupportedMimeTypes()
        Returns:
        the supported mime types representing this language
